column4: how come in ubuntu i only have the options for 40/128 bit wep encryption and no 64-bit ?
WEP encryption is insecure, no matter what you do.
do you know the difference between 128-bit and 128-bit passphrase?
err somewhat, passphrase wants a passphrase whilst 128 bit just wants the key
feel free to PM the key/passphrase and I'll take a guess at which one it is :)
the key is  a1tks3nuyv those are the characters just not in the right order ;)
okay, is it equally jumbled up when in the right order?
if i choose that then the connect/ok button stays greyed out
if i choose 128-passphrase it fails to connect
you sure you typed in all 10 chars?
umm, I'm not really sure sorry, that should work (and works over here). Only other idea I have is wicd
